name: impounded
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
impound
If the police impound something that belongs to you, they take it away because you have broken the law: The police impounded cars and other personal property belonging to the drug dealers. The vehicle was impounded by customs. Compare
confiscate
